subject: Relief for Contractors-Developers of Road Sector in view of COVID-19 pandemic
text: HRa4 7rty TTTHTf mifearut T414 / Phone 91-11-25074100/25074200 M (sm wdrv &k_{NHf 414) Tar / Fax : 91-11-25093507 25093514 National Highways Authority of India (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) 0i-5 Va 6, #aer-10 , ERar, # fcait-110075 G-5 & 6, Sector-10, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI/Policy Guidelines/Atmanirbhar Bharat/2022 Policy Circular No: 18.77/2022 dated 17th January, 2022 {Decision taken on E-Office File No: NHAI/COVID-19/RoadMap/ CMD/2020 (Comp No.5788)} Sub: Relief for   Contractors-Developers of Road Sector in view of COVID-19 pandemic. MoRTH vide Letter No. COVID-19/RoadMap/JS(H)/2020 dated 04.01.2022 on the subject mentioned above has extended some relief measures provided earlier vide MoRTH letter dated 26.08.2021 & 08.10.2021. A copy of the same is attached herewith for information and implementation: 2_ This issues with the approval of Competent Authority. Encl:: As stated above T2 ellev (Sanjay Kumar Patel) General Manager (Coord.) To: All Officers of NHAI HQ ROs/ PIUs/ CMUs/ Site Offices to: 1 _ Hindi Officer for translation in Hindi. 2_ Library for hosting the circular on library site. 3 Web Admin for circulation.
